title: Beef spaghetti bake
ingredients: ['450g spaghetti', '450g lean minced beef', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of mushroom soup', '350ml water', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of tomato soup', '275g grated mature Cheddar cheese']
